headline: Federal Realty Expands West Coast Presence with Acquisition of Del Monte Shopping Center
summary: Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:FRT) has acquired Del Monte Shopping Center, a 674,000-square-foot, 47-acre, grocery-anchored lifestyle center in Monterey, California, for $123.5 million. As the dominant retail destination on the Monterey Peninsula, Del Monte Shopping Center is uniquely positioned on Highway 1—the region's major commercial and commuter spine. The property serves a trade area of over 225,000 residents and is the region's most visited retail center within a 15-mile radius. I

content.title: Federal Realty Expands West Coast Presence with Acquisition of Del Monte Shopping Center
content.summary: Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:FRT) has acquired Del Monte Shopping Center, a 674,000-square-foot, 47-acre, grocery-anchored lifestyle center in Monterey, California, for $123.5 million. As the dominant retail destination on the Monterey Peninsula, Del Monte Shopping Center is uniquely positioned on Highway 1—the region's major commercial and commuter spine. The property serves a trade area of over 225,000 residents and is the region's most visited retail center within a 15-mile radius. I

thumbnail.caption: Federal Realty is a recognized leader in the ownership, operation and redevelopment of high-quality retail based properties located primarily in major coastal markets from Washington, D.C. to Boston as well as San Francisco and Los Angeles. (PRNewsfoto/Federal Realty Investment Trust)
